pages.text: MIMI supports a handful of different key binds for various actions. Key binds can all be changed from the Minecraft Controls --> Key Binds menu.$(br2)This section lists all of the key binds and their current values.

pages.title: Stop All Notes
pages.text: Current keybind: $(l)$(k:key.mimi.midi.alloff)$()$(br2)Pressing this key immediately stops all notes that are on. This is primarily meant to be used if a note gets stuck on for a long period of time.$(br2)Note that this bind does not stop new notes from being turned on.

pages.title: Device Config Screen
pages.text: Current keybind: $(l)$(k:key.mimi.midi.gui.settings)$()$(br2)Pressing this key opens the MIDI Input Device Screen.

pages.title: Transmitter Screen
pages.text: Current keybind: $(l)$(k:key.mimi.midi.gui.transmitter)$()$(br2)Pressing this key opens the Transmitter Screen if you have a Transmitter in your hands or on your hotbar.

pages.title: Inst. Main Hand
pages.text: Current keybind: $(l)$(k:key.mimi.midi.gui.main)$()$(br2)Pressing this key opens the Instrument Screen for the instrument in your main hand, if there is one.

pages.title: Inst. Off Hand
pages.text: Current keybind: $(l)$(k:key.mimi.midi.gui.off)$()$(br2)Pressing this key opens the Instrument Screen for the instrument in your off hand, if there is one.

pages.title: Inst. Seated
pages.text: Current keybind: $(l)$(k:key.mimi.midi.gui.seat)$()$(br2)Pressing this key opens the Instrument Screen for the instrument that you are seated at, if there is one.
